messages.title: How we can change the future together

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a sane, balanced and fair immigration policy. Control points based on AUSTRALIA's POINTS-BASED SYSTEM twelve months a year.
UKIP aim is to invest an extra £3 billion in the NHS to cure waiting two-tier health systems.
UKIP want to leave EU and spend our government's gross contribution of £55 million every day on our priorities such as the NHS, schools and housing.

UKIP will RAISE the personal allowance to the level of full-time minimum wage (approx. £13,500 by next April), so that you can earn enough money to cover your basic living costs before the taxman dips his fingers into your pay.
If we stop foreign aid spending and spend it here, we could spend £11 billion on AID on our own people.

images.caption: CHRIS WRIGHT Standing up in St Albans for Real Change
